text:
e="preserve">Arne Nilsen (21 January 1924 – 16 April 2020) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. He was Minister of Local Government from 1978 to 1979 and Minister of Social Affairs from 1979 to 1981. He was also President of the Odelsting from 1981 to 1985.
Nilsen died in Bergen, Norway on 16 April 2020 at the age of 96.
